create_network(settings, f)[source]¶
default(line)[source]¶
do_EOF(line)[source]¶

End the program

do_add_flow(line)[source]¶

add_flow [id] [src] [dest] [amount] [start] Add a flow

do_add_host(line)[source]¶

add_host [id] [id] ... [id] Add multiple hosts

do_add_link(line)[source]¶

add_link [id] [device_id] [device_id] [delay] [rate] [buffer] Add a link

do_add_router(line)[source]¶

add_router [id] [id] ... [id] Add multiple routers

do_clear(line)[source]¶

Clear the graph

do_close(line)[source]¶

Close the graph

do_delete_device(line)[source]¶

delete_device [id] [id] ... [id] Delete multiple devices. Can also run delete_device * to delete all devices

do_delete_flow(line)[source]¶

delete_flow [id] [id] ... [id] Delete multiple flows. Can also run delete_flow * to delete all flows

do_delete_link(line)[source]¶

delete_link [id] [id] ... [id] Delete multiple links. Can also run delete_link * to delete all links

do_dump(line)[source]¶

dump [filename] Saves the network to a file

do_exit(line)[source]¶

End the program

do_load(line)[source]¶

load [filename] Load a file

do_reset(line)[source]¶

Reset network

do_reset_v(line)[source]¶

Reset parameters for interactive

do_run(line)[source]¶

Run the network

do_set_dpi(line)[source]¶

set_dpi [dpi] Set the dpi

do_set_output(line)[source]¶

set_output [output] Show text output of the network if output == True

do_set_proj(line)[source]¶

set_proj [proj] Set the projection type

do_set_routing_packet_size(line)[source]¶

set_routing_packet_size [size] Set routing packet size

do_set_show(line)[source]¶

set_show [show] Show the network after every command if show == True

do_set_static_routing(line)[source]¶

set_static_routing [static_routing] Set static routing

do_set_tcp_alg(line)[source]¶

set_tcp_alg [alg] Set TCP algorithm. Valid options are: Reno, Tahoe, Fast

do_set_verbose(line)[source]¶

set_verbose [verbose] Set verbose output

do_show(line)[source]¶

Show the network

do_stop(line)[source]¶

Stop the network with Ctrl-C
